resources.string: Restra is a Restaurant Finder App, which finds best restaurants all over the world.
Q2 How to mark Favourites Restaurant from the Restaurant List?
From the Restaurant List, tap on Heart Icon to mark your favourite restaurant. And it will be added to Favourite List.
Q3 How to authenticate to use the Restra?
User can access Restra App just by creating an account with Email and Password, or simply login with your existing Google Account.
Q4 How to give rating to particular restaurant?

To improve performance of anything feedback of customer is very important. Restra also providing facility to give your feedback to restaurants. Just few simple clicks and your feedback will be recorded. Go to About page of any restaurant and Click on Add Reviews. Give your feedback and it will be display on particular restaurant page.
Q5 How to go on particular restaurant page?

There are multiple ways to go on particular restaurant page. Search restaurant city wise or cuisine wise and select restaurant from list. Restra providing one unique functionality too i.e. unique URL for every restaurant. If restaurant URL on Restra is known then type URL and directly go to restaurant page.
Q6 Who is the developer of Restra?
Restra is developed by Atul Kumar Gupta aka AG K Minds, who is a Native Android App Developer. He is currently pursuing B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering from Jabalpur Engineering College.
Your order has been successfully completed. Within a moment you will receive a notification with the receipt of your purchase and track every steps of your order.
A password should be alphanumeric. First letter of the password should be capital. Password must contain a special character (@, $, !, &, etc). Password length must be greater than 8 characters.
